raw_body: MEURLING – BRENDON REMIGUS – Darling son of Victor & Carmen (nee Thiele),​​ loving husband of Michelle (nee Gerrey),​​ devoted father of Jessica,​​ beloved brother of Marlon,​​ son-in-law of Andrew & Jenny,​​ brother-in-law of Indika,​​ Sean Dilakshi,​​ Keith & Vinoda,​​ doting uncle of Shanelle,​​ Dillon,​​ Amy,​​ Kate,​​ Josh & Nathan,​​ expired. Viewing on Monday 12th from 8.30 a.m. at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s. Cortege leaves for burial at 4.00 p.m. at General Cemetery (R.C. Section),​​ Borella.            010565
